abstracts.cdata!:
The project would seek to raise
            agricultural production and farm incomes by increasing the
            effective utilization of available irrigation water
            supplies. The project would upgrade irrigation and drainage
            systems of selected areas covering 95,000 ha in five
            existing irrigation schemes. To ensure reliable water
            supplies to the farm level, the project would emphasize
            improvements to minor networks and field channels. It would
            provide construction and equipment, training, adaptive
            research and improved water management.
